shows.title: Love and Wine
shows.plot_overview: A privileged young man working at his wealthy father's business traps himself in a lie when he falls in love with a hard-working medical student, and tries to convince her that he comes from more humble beginnings like hers. What follows is a comedic whirlwind of chaos and heartfelt revelations.

shows.title: Yuri's Ring
shows.plot_overview: Yoshii, a middle-aged man with a dull personality, runs a run-down bar. The bar barely manages to survive thanks to the support of longtime regulars. His only salvation is the hostess Ayumi. However, Ayumi,  decides to retire to marry regular customer Kataoka. Yoshii is driven to despair, but Ayumi introduces Yuri to him. At first sight, Yoshii sees her as his late daughter, Akiyo... (Third film about the bar owner Goro Yoshii, after "Sunflower Days" and "Akemi Bar"). [Exists in two versions (R1
